cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Standard 12 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Big crew, big energy. Our 12-bed mixed dorm is perfect for social travellers looking to soak up the beachside buzz. Located on the second floor, these dorms come with epic views of Coogee Beachï¿½wake up to sea breezes and surf sounds every morning.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Superior 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: This 6-bed mixed dorm is part of a shared apartment-style spaceï¿½perfect for travellers who want room to relax and connect. Youï¿½ll share a comfy living area and and bathroom with just one other 4-bed dorm and a private micro-room,12 guests total.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Superior 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our 4-bed mixed dorm offers a more intimate stay with all the perks of shared hostel life. Youï¿½ll be in a cozy 4-person room within an apartment-style space, sharing a lounge and en suite bathroom with just eight other guests.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 14th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 14th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
